scripts.obfuscate: powershell -Command Set-ExecutionPolicy -Scope Process -ExecutionPolicy Bypass && powershell -Command  javascript-obfuscator .\app.js --output .\dist\ && powershell -Command "Get-ChildItem -Path .\routers\ -Filter *.js -Recurse | ForEach-Object { javascript-obfuscator $_.FullName --output .\dist\routers\ }" && powershell -Command "Get-ChildItem -Path .\mobile_routers\ -Filter *.js -Recurse | ForEach-Object { javascript-obfuscator $_.FullName --output .\dist\mobile_routers\ }" && powershell -Command "Get-ChildItem -Path .\middleware\ -Filter *.js -Recurse | ForEach-Object { javascript-obfuscator $_.FullName --output .\dist\middleware\ }" && powershell -Command "Get-ChildItem -Path .\models\ -Filter *.js -Recurse | ForEach-Object { javascript-obfuscator $_.FullName --output .\dist\models\ }" && powershell -Command "Get-ChildItem -Path .\routers\test\ -Filter *.js -Recurse | ForEach-Object { javascript-obfuscator $_.FullName --output .\dist\routers\test\ }" && xcopy .\package.json .\dist\ /I /Y && xcopy .\package-lock.json .\dist\ /I /Y && xcopy .\views\ .\dist\views\ /E /I /H /Y && xcopy .\public\ .\dist\public\ /E /I /H /Y && xcopy .\.env .\dist\ /I /Y
